data.name: Splatter - Zombiecalypse Now Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The music of "Splatter - Zombiecalypse Now" is mostly composed and done by Sven Gerlach, a german artist.

SUPPORT THE DEVELOPER AND ARTISTS

Buy it, if you want to support the developers and the artist of the music and sounds from Splatter.

YOU THINK YOU PAYED TO LESS FOR OUR GAME?

Also buy it and get the soundtrack as a bonus! :)
